text: I came up with a Honey-Do list last night.
I want to get Mrs. Blob a Moon Gem, Flowers, and New Furniture.
But how will I ever accomplish such great feats?!
They say throwing a coin into the ancient Blobby Fountain calls mystical help.
Mr.Blob throws the coin into the fountain.
I'm kinda hopeless. Better throw in a second.
Mr.Blob throws a second coin into the fountain.
Upon the fountain, your wishes take flight,
Landed upon our most curious line of sight.
Your Honey-Do list shall not prolong!
Mist surrounds Mr.Blob and transform Blobby town.
I never knew we had a furniture store and a space travel agency.
